name: survive the cubes (ZjamberEaber)
description:
This was my first ever full Unity game, written at the age of 16. 

You play as a bouncing cube, doomed to bounce eternally, on a stone "pillar" surrounded by lava. Around the "pillar" there are red cubes being launched at you, and you need to dodge all of the red cubes. The aim is to survive as long as possible, you die by falling in the lava or by getting hit by a red cube. 

You use WASD to move and mouse to look around.
